rules: Rule1: If drug1 is approved, then drug1 is safe.
Rule2: Either drug1 is approved or drug1 is tested.
Rule3: Provided that material1 is expired, material1 is contaminated.
Rule4: Furniture1 is defective, or if it is not the case that drug1 is not safe implies material1 is expired, then material1 is not usable.
Rule5: Whenever furniture1 is stable, furniture1 is not defective.
Rule6: In the event that furniture1 is reinforced, furniture1 is stable.
Rule7: If drug1 is sterile, then drug1 is safe.
Rule8: Should company1 be audited, then either company1 is fined or if drug1 being recalled does not imply drug1 is distributed, then drug1 is investigated.
Rule9: Company1 is audited or company1 is inspected.
Rule10: Whenever company1 is inspected, then either company1 is fined or if drug1 being recalled does not imply drug1 is distributed, then drug1 is investigated.
Rule11: Furniture2 is damaged or drug1 is packaged.

Rule13: Furniture2 is repaired or furniture2 is replaced.
Rule14: In the event that furniture2 is replaced, furniture2 is not damaged.
Rule15: Drug1 being documented implies that if drug1 is synthesized, then if drug1 is tested, drug1 is safe.
Rule16: Should drug1 be registered, then drug1 is documented.
Rule17: Either drug2 is approved or drug1 is registered.
Rule18: If material2 is accepted, then material2 is rejected.
Rule19: Provided that material3 is delivered, material3 is ordered.
Rule20: Material3 is delivered or material3 is received.
Rule21: If material3 is received, then if drug1 is not packaged, material2 is accepted.

Rule24: Provided that company1 is certified, company1 is not suspended.
Rule25: In the event that material4 is approved, material4 is tested.

Rule27: If material4 is tested, then material4 is qualified.

Rule29: Furniture3 is cleaned or furniture3 is sanitized.
Rule30: Should furniture3 be sanitized, then furniture1 is stable.
Rule31: Furniture3 being maintained implies that if furniture3 is cleaned, then furniture1 is stable.
Rule32: If material5 is filtered, then material1 is contaminated.

Rule34: Provided that material5 is irradiated, then if drug1 is not safe, material5 is filtered.
Rule35: Material5 being processed implies that material5 is sterilized or material5 is irradiated.
Rule36: Drug2 is contaminated or drug1 is sterile.
Rule37: Drug2 is recalled or drug2 is destroyed.
Rule38: In the event that drug2 is destroyed, drug2 is not contaminated.
Rule39: Drug1 being analyzed implies that if drug1 is synthesized, then if drug1 is tested, drug1 is safe.
Rule40: Either company1 is licensed or drug1 is not recalled.
Rule41: Company1 is accredited or company1 is not licensed.
Rule42: If equipment1 is calibrated, then equipment1 is verified.
Rule43: Provided that equipment1 is verified, then if drug1 is examined, drug1 is investigated.
Rule44: Drug1 being quarantined implies that if drug1 is not sterile, then drug1 is disposed.
Rule45: If drug1 is reviewed, then drug1 is analyzed.
Rule46: Drug1 being packaged implies that if drug1 is purified, then if drug1 is synthesized, then if drug1 is tested, drug1 is safe.
Rule47: In the event that drug1 is labeled, drug1 is packaged.
Rule48: Drug1 is labeled or drug1 is sealed.
Rule49: Should drug1 be sealed, then drug1 is packaged.
Rule50: Provided that drug1 being recalled does not imply drug1 is distributed, then drug1 is examined.
Rule51: If drug1 being recalled does not imply drug1 is distributed, then drug1 is not investigated.
Rule52: Should company1 being compliant not imply company1 is violating, then company1 is certified.
Rule53: In the event that drug2 being recalled does not imply drug2 is not contaminated, then company2 is penalized.
Rule54: If drug2 being recalled does not imply drug2 is not contaminated, then company2 is not penalized.
Rule55: Should it not be the case that drug1 is not safe implies material1 is expired not imply material1 is not usable, then company1 is compliant.
Rule56: If it is not the case that drug1 is not safe implies material1 is expired, then material1 is usable.
Rule57: If drug1 is not sterile, then drug1 is recalled.
Rule58: If drug1 is not quarantined, then drug1 is reviewed.
Rule59: In the event that drug1 is not safe, material1 is not contaminated.
